clues.clue: (A.O. Scott presents the clue.)  This nearly flawless 2007 Pixar film featured a French rodent who had a passion for fine cooking.  I called him a "rat for all seasonings"

clues.clue: (A.O. Scott presents the clue.)  I raved about this first-time actress in "Dreamgirls" who upstaged an Oscar winner, a pop diva & a movie star of long standing.  She's "not going anywhere, she has arrived"
